text: Sargodha Tehsil is a tehsil (administrative subdivision) of Sargodha District in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The tehsil is subdivided into 62 Union Councils - 22 of which form the city of Sargodha. == Related pages == * Behak Maken Category:Tehsils of Sargodha District
title: Sargodha Tehsil
